title: Gesturing related to storytelling style, not nationality, study

title_detail.value: Gesturing related to storytelling style, not nationality, study

summary: New research suggests that the amount you gesture when telling a story has more to do with what you're saying than where you're from.

summary_detail.value: New research suggests that the amount you gesture when telling a story has more to do with what you're saying than where you're from.
